subject: Invoice for Corban Atkins
body:
Hello Kay Atkins,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Corban Atkins): for a total of $20.00.

Specific Note

The bill is only for 20 dollars because there is only 1 other lesson in February. In March we will move to the regular billing of the 40 dollars a month.

Normally, the bills get charged at the 1st of the month.

Details


Corban Atkins: 1 invoice totaling $20.00


Invoice #47 for $20.00


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $20.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Music Instruction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.

Contact Information

Telephone: 336-406-1319
